artist: Painter: Jean Baptiste Mauzaisse; Lithographer: Villain
description: half length portrait of Bartholomew Vander-Helst facing slightly left looking out at viewer; long wavy hair; wearing cloak with white stock with wide lace edge

title: Portrait of Vander-Helst
